Notes: Voyager 2 launch: 20 Aug 1977. Voyager 1 launch: 5 Sept 1977.
Voyager 1 Jupiter encounter: 5 Mar 1979. Voyager 2 Jupiter encounter: 9 Jul 1979.
Voyager 1 Saturn encounter: 9 Nov 1980. Voyager 2 Saturn encounter: 25 Aug 1981.
Voyager 1 "Pale Blue Dot" image: 14 Feb 1990. Cameras deactivated.
Voyager operations transferred to "Space Physics MO&DA" account from planetary exploration
